overview: Niall Donnelly is a serial entrepreneur in Entertainment, Media and Nightlife. The Irish Times and Irish Entrepreneur magazine recently named Donnelly as one of the top 10 Irish “Entrepreneurs to Watch”¬ù worldwide, citing his unconventional creativity, vision and record of success in many sectors of business both sides of the Atlantic. He founded a an entertainment group in London and in Jan 2011 he launched the first ever “Rolling Stone Magazine” restaurant and lounge concept in the world in Hollywood, California. He recently founded yield management nightlife business Bevvy.com which was named in the top 100 companies in the US by Entrepreneur Magazine. In March 2011 Donnelly was voted in the “Top 5 Irish Entrepreneurs” by Smarta.com. Additionally, he is the former owner of the media streaming site Newsplayer.com.
